shot.composition: POV racing behind a red blood cell into an active clotting cascade at a vessel injury site. 16:9.
shot.lens: Macro lens with high-speed shutter, capturing the chaotic action.
shot.frame_rate: 240fps (for extreme slow-motion visualization of platelet activation).
shot.camera_movement: Violent, shaky camera movement navigating the turbulent and rapidly obstructing flow. Sudden deceleration upon arrival at the site.

subject.description: A sudden, violent storm of platelets activating (transforming from smooth discs to spiky, sticky structures) and clumping together. Fibrin strands rapidly weaving a complex, golden net, trapping red blood cells.
subject.props: Exposed collagen fibers at the injury site, cellular debris, chemical signals (glowing particles).

scene.environment: Breached vessel wall, chaotic flow, rapidly forming clot structure. A localized whirlwind of activity.

visual_details.action: Dodging sticky platelet clumps, navigating through the forming fibrin net, avoiding being trapped in the clot. The speed and efficiency of the process are emphasized.
visual_details.special_effects: Dynamic simulation of clot formation, sticky particle effects, intense turbulence visualization, motion blur.
visual_details.negative_prompt_video: Calm flow, clear path, blurry details, low resolution, flickering, black and white, grey tones, simple rendering, minimalism, slow process.

cinematography.lighting: Harsh, dramatic, strobe-like lighting highlighting the fibrin strands and the specular highlights on the sticky platelets. Deep shadows.
cinematography.color_palette: Bright crimson (fresh blood), pale yellow/amber/gold (platelets and fibrin), dark burgundy (trapped blood).

audio.music: Fast-paced, chaotic action score with heavy percussion, screeching strings, and complex electronic rhythms (breakbeat style).
audio.ambient: Roaring turbulence, muffled sound of tearing tissue.
audio.sound_effects: Sticky impact sounds, rapid snapping and whipping sounds as fibrin forms, intense whooshing, cellular activity whine.
